net.openhft.chronicle.bytes

Interface RandomCommon<S extends RandomCommon<S,A,AT>,A extends AccessCommon<AT>,AT>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bytes<Underlying>, BytesStore<B,Underlying>, ByteStringAppender<B,A,AT>, ByteStringParser<B,A,AT>, RandomDataInput<S,A,AT>, RandomDataOutput<R,A,AT>, StreamingCommon<S,A,AT>, StreamingDataInput<S,A,AT>, StreamingDataOutput<S,A,AT>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBytes, ExpectedBytesStore, HeapBytesStore, MappedBytes, MappedBytesStore, NativeBytes, NativeBytesStore, NoBytesStore, PointerBytesStore, SubBytes, SubZeroedBytes, VanillaBytes, ZeroedBytes

      • address

        long address()
      throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Obtain the underlying address. This is for expert users only.
        Returns:
        the underlying address of the buffer
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying buffer is on the heap
